name: Vitale #4
description: Your 3.28 carat round brilliant cut natural diamond is a remarkable gemstone with specific attributes that contribute to its beauty and value. Its VVS2 clarity, very very small inclusions, is combined with a slightly tinted white I colour, resulting in a captivating sparkle accentuated by its precise cut. Impeccably graded and crafted, this diamond promises timeless beauty and investment potential.
